ms_MY {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "R",
            "MYR ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "Aha",
            "Isn",
            "Sel",
            "Rab",
            "Kha",
            "Jum",
            "Sab",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "Ahad",
            "Isnin",
            "Selasa",
            "Rahb",
            "Khamis",
            "Jumaat",
            "Sabtu",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Malay language locale for Malaysia" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Malay" }
        Territory { "Malaysia" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.92b" }
        Date { "2000,September,4 (XML source:2000,July,20)" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY]" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN]" }
        YesStr { "Yes" }
        NoStr { "No" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Jan",
            "Feb",
            "Mac",
            "Apr",
            "Mei",
            "Jun",
            "Jul",
            "Ogos",
            "Sep",
            "Okt",
            "Nov",
            "Dis",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "Januari",
            "Februari",
            "Mac",
            "April",
            "Mei",
            "Jun",
            "Julai",
            "Ogos",
            "September",
            "Oktober",
            "November",
            "Disember",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%p%t%f%t%g" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;(\u00A4#,##0.00)",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c ;%a ;%l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "" }
    }
}
